Name: The Mangotronics Employment Collection
About the game: The Mangotronics Employment Collection© is a new anthology of 9 indie games by developers from across the world themed around the riveting subject of employment! Wrapped up into one Nice & Neat UI with a pleasing UX for all your business entertainment needs, The Mangotronics Employment Collection™ delivers value for your dollar, and supports current and future indie game developers in the alt-game and hyper indie scenes. Games: BoxCorp by Breogan Hackett Passage: Chapter 1 & 2 by Emcat Games My Dream Job: How I Survived Job Hunting in Animation by Bubbly Oasis Chaos Lab and Office Combat by Robert Doman Job at Risk by Hraezvelg Mud Slinger by Amon26 Crap Job and Crazy Factory by Oniric Factor More Games... Coming later as free content updates/DLC packs! Ask your local computer software dealer about The Mangotronics® Difference™ today! Note: Crap Job (Mesen) SteamPlay on Linux via Proton requires that you have mono-complete, libsdl2, and gnome-themes-standard installed. See instructions here #ubuntu
Developers: Blindbug Interactive,Emcat Games,Robert Doman,Job at Risk,Bubbly Oasis,Oniric Factor,Amon26
